thread.title: Fitch Affirms Region of Umbrias Credit-linked Notes at BBB+ on Sovereign Action
thread.title_full: Fitch Affirms Region of Umbrias Credit-linked Notes at BBB+ on Sovereign Action

title: Fitch Affirms Region of Umbrias Credit-linked Notes at BBB+ on Sovereign Action
text:
Fitch Affirms Region of Umbria's Credit-linked Notes at 'BBB+' on Sovereign Action 
Fitch Ratings Saturday 24th October, 2015 
Fitch Ratings has assigned Agricultural Bank of China Limited's (ABC; A/Stable) long-term green bonds issued under its medium-term note (MTN) programme Long-Term Ratings of 'A'. 
...
